title: CL Underground - A Night Walking Through Mirrors (2017)
description: Chicago / London Underground A Night Walking Through Mirrors 2017 - Cuneiform Records: RUNE 428 http://www.cuneiformrecords.com/bandshtml/chicagolondonunderground.html * Rob Mazurek : cornet, sampler, electronics, voice * Chad Taylor : drums, mbira, electronics * Alexander Hawkins: piano * John Edwards : double bass http://www.chadtaylordrums.net/ http://www.alexanderhawkinsmusic.com/ http://www.efi.group.shef.ac.uk/musician/medwards.html Recorded by Mark Jasper live at Cafe OTO in London, England on April 21, 2016. Reviews ~~~~~~~ By George W. Harris http://www.jazzweekly.com/2017/06/chicagolondon-underground-a-night-walking-through-mirrors/ The band Chicago/London Underground is comprised of Rob Mazurek/ct-elec, Chad Taylor/dr-perc-elec, Alexander Hawkins/p and John Edwards/b. These four compositions are performed in concert, ranging from 15-24 minutes,and are filled with free form ideas bouncing off of the walls. Mazurek has his horn slurp, gasp and make other valve effects with jarring drums and bowed bass on “A Night Spent Walking Through Mirrors” followed by Hawkins’ scrambling piano amidst electronic distortions on” Something Must Happen.” A stampede mixed with animal sounds from subtones create an avalanche on “Boss Redux” and the show closes with a thrashing drum feature on “Mysteries of Emanating Light.” Was there a laser show that accompanied this? -- By Greg Buium http://www.pointofdeparture.org/PoD59/PoD59MoreMoments2.html By Karl Ackermann http://www.allaboutjazz.com/a-night-walking-through-mirrors-chicago-london-underground-cuneiform-records-review-by-karl-ackermann.php By Glenn Astarita http://www.allaboutjazz.com/a-night-walking-through-mirrors-chicago-london-underground-cuneiform-records-review-by-glenn-astarita.php By Barry Witherden http://www.allaboutjazz.com/a-night-walking-through-mirrors-chicago-london-underground-cuneiform-records-review-by-barry-witherden.php Jan Granlie (no) http://salt-peanuts.eu/record/chicago-london-underground/ Da Sergio Spampinato (it) http://www.distorsioni.net/canali/dischi/a-night-walking-through-mirrors Da Andrea Baroni (it) http://www.traccedijazz.it/index.php/recensioni/2691-chicago-london-undergound-a-night-walking-through-mirrors
